controlled_vocabulary.comment: This vocabulary describes what criteria were used to establish a threshold for significant variation

term.name: fold_over
term.description: the ratio (greater than one) of the treatment to control after background correction, displayed with a preceding plus sign

term.name: fold_under
term.description: the inverse of ratio (less than one) of the treatment to control after background correction, displayed with a minus sign preceding it

term.name: up_regulated
term.description: a given gene increases its expression relative to the control

term.name: down_regulated
term.description: a given gene decreases its expression relative to the control
